reviewText: for all people, not just for catholics.
LOVE IT! Very informative. We should give a copy to all Protestant churches. All 35,000 of them who do not offer obedience to the Chair of Peter!
Great Viewing!  This video really provides a comprehensive look at Mary, the Mother of Christ!
Interesting; Informative; and easy to read.

Not critiquing the contents, but the DVD itself was defective.  The speakers on it "froze" often, the menu had scenes but you couldn't access them individually, etc.  Tried it on 2 different DVD players.  Amazon was nice enough to refund price.
A comprehensive study highlighting scriptural basis for the truths about Mary.  Highly recommend as part of catholic faith formation.  Clear and concise.

Take 60 minutes to learn about why we venerate (not worship as a goddess, that would be a mortal sin!) our Mother Mary. She is very important in helping to run Christ's kingdom as the Queen Mother (1 Kings 2:19).
"Working with Mary to serve Christ!"
Mark
